SELECT ENTITY_TYPE_UUID as entityTypeUuid , ENTITY_TYPE_CODE as entityType , ENTITY_TYPE_NAME as entityName , DESCRIPTION as description , NOTES as netes , USE_YN as useYN , AUDIT_YN as auditYN
,
as insertUuid
, INSERT_DATE as insertDate
,
as updateUuid
, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM AD_ENTITY_TYPE WHERE 1=1
AND ENTITY_TYPE_CODE = LIKE '%'||#{entityType} ||'%'
AND ENTITY_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{entityName} ||'%'
AND USE_YN = #{useYN}
ORDER BY ENTITY_TYPE_CODE ASC

SELECT Z2.ENTITY_COLUMN_UUID AS entityColumnUuid, NVL(Z2.ENTITY_TYPE_UUID,(SELECT ENTITY_TYPE_UUID FROM AD_ENTITY_TYPE WHERE ENTITY_TYPE_CODE = #{entityType})) AS entityTypeUuid, Z2.GLOSSARY_UUID AS glossaryUuid, Z2.TERM_CODE AS termCode, Z2.TERM_NAME AS termName, FC_AD_CODE_NM (Z2.DATA_TYPE_UUID) AS dataType1, Z1.COLUMN_NAME AS columnName, Z1.COMMENTS AS comments, Z1.DATA_TYPE AS dataType2, Z1.NULLABLE AS nullable, NVL(Z2.AUDIT_YN,'N') AS auditYN, Z2.DESCRIPTION AS description, Z2.NOTES AS notes, NVL(Z2.USE_YN,'N') AS useYN, FC_AC_USER_NM (Z2.INSERT_UUID) AS insertUuid, Z2.INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, FC_AC_USER_NM (Z2.UPDATE_UUID) AS updateUuid, Z2.UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM (SELECT A.TABLE_NAME, A.COLUMN_NAME, B.COMMENTS, A.DATA_TYPE, A.NULLABLE, A.COLUMN_ID FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS A, ALL_COL_COMMENTS B WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{entityType}) Z1, (SELECT A.ENTITY_TYPE_CODE, B.ENTITY_COLUMN_UUID, B.ENTITY_TYPE_UUID, B.GLOSSARY_UUID, C.TERM_CODE, C.TERM_NAME, C.DATA_TYPE_UUID, B.AUDIT_YN, B.DESCRIPTION, B.NOTES, B.USE_YN, B.INSERT_UUID, B.INSERT_DATE, B.UPDATE_UUID, B.UPDATE_DATE FROM AD_ENTITY_TYPE A, AD_ENTITY_COLUMN B, AD_GLOSSARY C WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.ENTITY_TYPE_UUID = B.ENTITY_TYPE_UUID AND C.GLOSSARY_UUID = B.GLOSSARY_UUID AND A.ENTITY_TYPE_CODE = #{entityType}) Z2 WHERE Z1.COLUMN_NAME = Z2.TERM_CODE(+) ORDER BY Z1.COLUMN_ID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TABLE_NAME) FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{entityType}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS Z1, AD_ENTITY_TYPE Z2, AD_GLOSSARY Z3 WHERE Z1.TABLE_NAME = Z2.ENTITY_TYPE_CODE AND Z1.COLUMN_NAME = Z3.TERM_CODE AND Z2.ENTITY_TYPE_UUID = #{entityTypeUuid} AND Z3.GLOSSARY_UUID = #{glossaryUuid}
